title: copycat starbucks ginger molasses cookies
steps: Line baking sheet with parchment paper or silicone baking mat.
Cream together butter & brown sugar in a mixer on high speed until light and fluffy.
With mixer on medium speed, beat in egg & molasses, then increase speed to high and beat until well-mixed.
Combine flour, baking soda, salt, cinnamon, and ginger. Mix into creamed batter at low speed.
Use an cookie scoop or rounded spoon to form uniform balls of dough around 1" in diameter, then roll into granulated sugar.
Place on baking sheet (caution: cookies will spread when baking!)
Bake for 12 mins, rotating halfway through.
